title: Arms and the Man
description: Takes place in 1885, during the Serbo-Bulgarian WarCast (in order of speaking):Narrator – AvailleCatherine Petkoff – Karen SavageRaina Petkoff – Elizabeth KlettLouka – Arielle LipshawMan (Captain Bluntschli) – mbOfficer – David LawrenceNicola – Barry EadsMajor Petkoff – Robert KeiperSergius Saranoff – Mark F. SmithAudio edited by Elizabeth Klett
author: George Bernard Shaw
